Add as friend Send Msg La Fogata Mexican Restaurant shurie January 7, 2009 5.0 5.0 star rating +1 0 +1 1 Votes Consistently Good
I have been to this restaurant many times and continue to go back because the food is consistently good, the pricing is reasonable, ordering is easy, and the food is ready in a short time.
La Fogata has a wide selection of Mexican food. You can go there many times and still find something new to try. They also have a few American dishes like hamburgers and fries for those people who don’t enjoy Mexican food.
There is no table service at la Fogata. Similar to a fast-food restaurant you place your order at the cash register and pay in advance. When your food is ready your number is called. However the seating is more restaurant-like with traditional booths and tables. Mariachi music plays in the background. There is a salsa bar.
Pricing for most combination plates is around 7 or 8 dollars.
